data.title: Senior Frontend Engineer, Accessibility
data.description: Build and maintain critical components used to construct Klaviyo’s frontend, across the whole product. Work closely with cross-functional teams, including developers, designers, and product managers, to implement and advocate for best practices in web accessibility.
